name: Spandine
text: [On Play] You may return 3 cards with [CP] in its Types from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order: Play up to 1 cost 4 or lower Character Card with [CP] in its types other than "Spandine" from your trash rested.

effect.text: You may return 3 cards with [CP] in its Types from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order: Play up to 1 cost 4 or lower Character Card with [CP] in its types other than "Spandine" from your trash rested.
